nodes.text: The Mundi family was a Cerean family from Cerea. Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi was the most famous member of the family. Due to the low Cerean birthrate, he was allowed by the other Jedi to follow the Cerean custom of polygamous marriage—he had four honor wives and seven daughters. The entire family was killed during the Battle of Cerea; Ki-Adi himself died when Order 66 was issued during the Battle of Mygeeto.
